content.rendered:
Grey and Pink Fashion Trend

We all love the cool sporty sweatshirt trend and adding a bit of color for spring is the perfect way to go especially with a grey sweatshirt.

I love this Helmut Lang sweatshirt and sweatpants with the pink logo and adding some bright pink leggings to get a modern 2021 look. I think these two colors really compliment each other and are perfect for Spring and Summer. 

We are still going strong with the sporty sweatsuit trend and 2021 is still all about comfort….but make it fashion.

Both looks are from FWRD.COM. Shoes and earrings are from Balenciaga. Luxury candles are by yours truly D’Lashes.com. Pink bag is from the new Jacquemus collection.

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Wishing you all tons of love, health, and safety!
